pageContext.claim: “[Asked about a threatening tweet sent while Ambassador Marie Yovanovitch was testifying in the House] I'll tell you about what tampering is. Tampering is when a guy like Shifty Schiff doesn't let us have lawyers. Tampering is when Schiff doesn't let us have witnesses, doesn't let us speak.”
pageContext.analysis: That's not witness tampering. The House has wide discretion over the rules of impeachment and is not required to give federal officials due process rights like defendants get in court.
